meanings.definition: A person who helps or supports others.
meanings.sent1: The aiders at the charity event handed out food to those in need.
meanings.sent2: The aiders in the community always lend a helping hand to their neighbors.
meanings.sent3: The aiders in the school play made sure everyone knew their lines.
meanings.sent4: The aiders in the group were like shining stars guiding others through tough times.
meanings.sent5: The aiders in the team were like guardian angels, watching over their teammates.

meanings.definition: Devices or tools used to assist in a particular task.
meanings.sent1: The aiders in the kitchen helped chop vegetables quickly and efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The aiders in the workshop made the job much easier with their specialized tools.
meanings.sent3: The aiders in the toolbox were always ready to lend a hand when needed.
meanings.sent4: The aiders in the garage were like secret weapons for fixing things in no time.
meanings.sent5: The aiders in the project were like magic wands, making everything fall into place effortlessly.
